about.description01: My name is Marc Zamora, born in 1976 in Barcelona. I currently live in Mataró (BCN).
about.description02: Always passionate about the visual arts and communication I decided to merge these two fields of my interest and specialize in graphic design as a form of visual communication.
about.description03: In recent years I have focused my work in the online world: design, mobile apps, banner campaigns, interface design.
about.description04: I’m really interested in UX techniques and methodologies, and I usually deal with Vue for my frontend development.

about.cta-02: Also, you can download my CV
